channel.title: Playstation Home
channel.description: Well today its supposed to be released. At the moment i cant connect to playstation online so im assuming they are doing the update now. Anyone know if there is a set time because their site doesnt say. Also is it just my internet packing up or are they genuinely adding home to the servers now? Edit: Read more about Home Here [url=http://uk.playstation.com/games-media/news/articles/detail/item134875/PlayStation-Home-opens-its-doors/]http://uk.playstation.com/games-media/news/articles/detail/item134875/PlayStation-Home-opens-its-doors/[/url] [img]http://uk.playstation.com/media/134783/161/Diesel%20Shop.jpg[/img] [img]http://uk.playstation.com/media/134784/161/LigneRoset%20Shop.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Life wrote:

mine was like c-674 or something cant connect to server.

Read full topic

item.title: Playstation Home
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:10, topic:250056”][quote author=Java Is My Life™ link=topic=329687.msg2577049#msg2577049 date=1229030250]
It’s out but it says Home beta when you open it and it’s so glitchy it wont even connect me to server.
[/quote]
And?

The servers are getting hammered by millions of people wanting to try it for the first time, it was expected tbh.[/quote]
i get error c-931 today when i try access

Read full topic

item.title: Playstation Home
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Um, nowhere in that thread did it say it was released. That was just the last update, saying that they are still trying to sort out the technical issues.

It isn’t out anywhere yet.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2008, 07:46:54 pm[/size][hr]Its up.

Read full topic

item.title: Playstation Home
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Life Java Is My Life™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Life wrote:

I checked that thread and it says 5:55pm in the UK its released but I’m in Canada and it isn’t there yet.

Read full topic

item.title: Playstation Home
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:4, topic:250056”]Yeah, i’ve been in the closed beta for a few weeks. Sony have said that they included it in one of the last updates and that once it is live all you need to do is restart your PS3 and the icon will appear on your playstation network tab on the XMB, click it and you’ll be asked to download it.

It works like Folding@Home/Life with playstation does.

http://community.eu.playstation.com/playstationeu/board/message?board.id=b_EN_PS3_Home&thread.id=58096&view=by_date_ascending&page=1[/quote]
ive been refreshing that thread for the last half hour trying to get more news

Read full topic

item.title: Playstation Home
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Yeah, i’ve been in the closed beta for a few weeks. Sony have said that they included it in one of the last updates and that once it is live all you need to do is restart your PS3 and the icon will appear on your playstation network tab on the XMB, click it and you’ll be asked to download it.

It works like Folding@Home/Life with playstation does.

community.eu.playstation.com – 11 Dec 08

News update - 11th December - Open Beta Day (**EDIT 9pm**)

Technical updates are progressing and as you have probably seen the 1.03 patch is available for existing users already but the service remains unavailable whilst work is carried out Service should be back up everywhere early PM UK time although...

Read full topic

item.title: Playstation Home
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Life™, post:2, topic:250056”]Omfg I’m gonna go turn my PS3 on now. You’re sure it’s today?

EDIT - Not in the playstation store yet might be tommorow morning because I’m in Canada.[/quote]
its not gonna be in store it will be its own icon in the network tab on the XMB menu

Read full topic
